title: FSX- RealAir - Lancair Legacy [RIP]

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Exterior and interior models now integrated for best experience with camera addons and track IR.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ High resolution multi-LOD exterior 3D models with optional frame rate friendly versions for multiplayer sessions.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Optional RXP GNS WAAS gauge integration (RXP gauges are a separate purchase from Reality XP).

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ RXP configurations include: 1 x GNS530, 1 x GNS430 + 1 x GNS530. If you have the RXP Unlimited pack you can also choose 2 x GNS530, 2 x GNS430 or 1 x GNS530 + 1 x GNS430, all with crossfill.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Gauge needles that vibrate on the ground in response to engine and ground roll vibrations.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Nearly 100 Custom sounds, including all cockpit switches, G effects, canopy-open windblast, gear, aileron flutter, doppler fly past etc.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Flap Failure mode with custom animations and sound effects.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Belly landing capability for gear up landings.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Grass or concrete touchdown sounds option.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Full multiplayer support with low latency and efficient coding for multiplayer sessions.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Yaw and out-of-balance yaw sound effects.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Carefully implemented start up and shutdown animations and sounds.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Full IFR capability - or fly by the seat of your pants!

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Custom 3D landing lights, navigation lights and strobe lights.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Multiple options for many of the above features.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 3D blurred propeller effect with custom animation that includes simulated cylinder compression of startup and shutdown.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 2048px "High Definition" VC and exterior textures.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Five unique liveries all with uniquely coloured virtual cockpits.
